channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: SpaceX pulls off Starship rocket launch in much-needed comeback
item.description: The Starship rocket is critical to the company's hopes of one day carrying people to the Moon and Mars.

item.title: Prosecutor who told police they would regret arresting her put on leave

item.title: Thousands play with tomatoes at La Tomatina Festival
item.description: Tomatoes not fit for consumption are thrown at each other during the festival.

item.title: Police respond to active shooter at Catholic school in Minneapolis
item.description: Law enforcement in south Minneapolis are responding to an active shooter situation at Annunciation Catholic School Wednesday morning.

item.title: Nigeria bans export of shea nuts used in beauty creams for six months
item.description: The country wants to move from being the biggest exporter of raw nuts to producing more shea butter.

item.description: The US president's steep 50% tariffs on India have kicked in, sending Narendra Modi's government into firefighting mode.
